name: HelpDen
tag_list: live-support, live-chat, live-help, free-live-support, live-chat-system, live-customer-support, online-help, online-support, support-desk
overview:
HelpDen offer an intuitive live help system for websites. It can be set-up in minutes with nothing to install. HelpDen focuses on keeping things simple and useful with important features live stats, time-tracking, branding and form design.

HelpDen Live Support SaaS is hosted in the cloud so that users don’t need to worry about installation, maintenance or uptime. It also features an easy-to-use, streamlined dashboard so that support agents can be using the system within minutes.

HelpDen offers a free version and a fully functional trial version.
